headline: Allstate SAVE Program Aims To Turn Q4 Strength Into Lasting Edge
summary: Allstate (NYSE:ALL) highlighted its SAVE program and new insurance offerings following strong Q4 results. The SAVE program reduced premiums for millions of policyholders while supporting policy growth. Management pointed to expense cuts, claims process changes, and product updates as key drivers of competitiveness. For a major personal lines insurer like Allstate, the combination of cost control and product refresh can matter as much as headline earnings. The company is focusing on lower...
